lines: 1. Kristo, In Wuon ng`wono duto,Puonj chunya mond` opaki;Gwethni ma ayudo pileMiyo chunya mor kuomi.Puonja heroi adieri,Mond` aluwi kwonde te;Muchi mondo dak e chunya,Miya genoi pile.
2. An apaki, In Jakonya,In mitelona pile;An kaluwo bang`i pile,Nachopi thurwa gi kuwe.Yandi Yesu to nodwaraKa nabayo yo marach;Rembe nochwer mond` owara,Noresa e kethona.
3. An to, an jagope chuthoKuom ng`wono motimona;Hera mari mond` otweyaAbed ng`ati chutho, Ruoth.Piny to kik oywaya kendo,Asik kuomi, yaye Jakony;Achiwoni chunya koro,Obed mari nyaka chieng`.
